The attached Statement "C" is a comparative statement of the Naval strength of various combinations of Powers at the present time and in 1923-24.If vessels of the pre-11 Orion" Classes and ec bivalent ships in other Navies are omitted the relative estimated strength of the various Navies in Capital Ships in 1923-^i will be as follows:- tEstimated Strength by 1923-24.
